FuncDef: This command displays GSMP sessions information.
CLIs: sessions [ group <name> ] [ neighbor <ip-address> ] [ port <port-number> ] [ association ] [ statistics ]

ParaDef.Info: A GSMP group defines a set of GSMP neighbors which have the same properties.
Specifies a GSMP group name is unique only within the scope of the service in which it is defined.
Specifies the ip-address of the neighbor.
Specifies the neighbor TCP port number use for this ANCP session. Values-0 to 65535.
Displays to what object the ANCP-string is associated.
Displays statistics information about an ANCP session known to the system.
